newsitem.title: CROATIA: Croatian stocks mostly higher in lively trade.
newsitem.headline: Croatian stocks mostly higher in lively trade.

text.p: Croatian stocks opened the week mostly higher in a lively trade on Tuesday, with food stock Podravka extending last week's gains.
* Eleven of sixteen active stocks rose, three fell and two were flat.
* Turnover almost doubled to 6.7 million kuna and volume was also higher at 11,597 shares.
* Biggest gainer food company Podravka added 14 kuna or 5 percent to 290 kuna on volume of 2,543.
* Biggest loser electrical manufacturer Koncar shed 60 kuna to 810 with 50 shares changing hands.
* Most active issue fully listed drugs firm Pliva closed six kuna higher at 464 on volume of 3.019 shares. -- Zagreb Newsroom, 385 1 4557075
